contents.text: Thank you for calling Odopod, your San Francisco digital design agency.
To speak with our design team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our design experts.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss a new website redesign project timeline and budget with your design team.
I’m planning a new veterans mental health resource website and need a design proposal.
Review UI/UX wireframes and discuss interaction design for my new mobile app project.
I need to talk to someone about starting a new website design project for my small business.
I’d like to start a new design project to create custom physics presentation graphics.

contents.text: To discuss development and engineering services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our engineering team.

navigationGoals: I’m calling to get a quote and timeline for developing a custom mobile app prototype.
I’d like to discuss building the backend functionality for my veteran job placement app.
Outline backend microservices architecture and get an estimate for the engineering scope.
I’d like to discuss the technical development of an online ordering app I’m planning.
I need to discuss engineering services for building an interactive physics simulation app.

contents.text: For existing client support and account questions, press 2.
For general client services and project updates, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold for a client services representative.

navigationGoals: I’d like a quick update on the status of my ongoing design project.
I need an update on my ongoing veteran support website redesign project.
Get a status update on the current development sprint and deliverable milestones.
I want an update on the status of the mobile app redesign you’re working on for me.
Can I get a status update on my ongoing physics club website project?

contents.text: To report an issue with your website or app, press 2.
We are connecting you to our technical support team. Please hold.

navigationGoals: There’s a critical bug on our live site that needs immediate technical support.
There’s a login error on my veterans services portal—please help me fix it.
Report a 500 Internal Server Error occurring on my website and troubleshoot the issue.
I’m having trouble accessing my website and need technical support to fix it.
I’m reporting a bug in the interactive physics demo app you built for me—it's crashing on launch.
